events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund for it since it doesn't match what I purchased.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message about receiving the wrong item.
Customer support agent Linda has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello, this is Linda from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’ll assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the order number so I can start the refund process for you?
Here is the photo of the wrong item that arrived and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email once done.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate how fast you're handling my refund request.
We have completed the refund to your original payment method. Please check your account and let us know if everything is in order.
Just following up to confirm you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As there have been no further responses, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
